meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a people.
meanings.sent1: The peoplehood of the community was evident during the annual festival.
meanings.sent2: The concept of peoplehood is important for understanding cultural identity.
meanings.sent3: The peoplehood of the town was so strong that they all wore matching shirts to the event.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, the true essence of peoplehood shines through.
meanings.sent5: The celebration showcased the vibrant peoplehood of the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The collective body of persons who compose a community, tribe, nation, or race.
meanings.sent1: The peoplehood gathered to discuss important community issues.
meanings.sent2: The peoplehood of the nation stood united in times of adversity.
meanings.sent3: The peoplehood of the tribe shared stories around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The peoplehood of the race came together for a charity run.
meanings.sent5: The peoplehood of the community welcomed newcomers with open arms.
